site.name: Astro.com - The Premier Destination for Professional Astrology
site.tagline: High-quality horoscope interpretations by world-leading astrologers Liz Greene and Robert Hand, plus free chart tools.
site.overview: Astro.com, operated by Swiss-based Astrodienst AG, stands as one of the internet's most established and respected astrology platforms. Founded by Dr. Alois Treindl, creator of the Swiss Ephemeris, the site offers an extensive range of free tools including chart calculations, daily horoscopes, and ephemeris data spanning 8,000+ years. The platform distinguishes itself through premium reports by acclaimed astrologers Liz Greene and Robert Hand, whose psychological depth has earned the "World's Best Horoscopes" reputation. Substantial free resources include AstroWiki encyclopedia and the 80,000+ entry Astro-Databank.

features.description: High-precision astronomical calculation engine covering 13201 BC to AD 17191, available for developers under dual licensing.

features.description: The Best Time feature helps find optimal dates for important activities based on astrological timing.

pros.details: Reports by Liz Greene and Robert Hand represent the gold standard in computerized astrological interpretation, combining decades of expertise with sophisticated synthesis technology.
The free chart generation, AstroWiki, Astro-Databank, and Swiss Ephemeris provide substantial value without payment, unusual for a commercial astrology site.
Unlike superficial sun-sign horoscopes, Astro.com's interpretations integrate Jungian psychology and focus on personal growth and self-understanding.
Available in 12 languages with reports translated professionally, making high-quality astrology accessible globally.
Swiss Ephemeris calculations offer 0.001 arcsecond precision, trusted by professional astrologers and software developers worldwide.
Extensive documentation covering website usage, data entry, chart interpretation, and technical issues demonstrates commitment to user education.
Clear privacy policy, GDPR compliance, EU representative, and option for complete data deletion show respect for user data.
Purchasing any product or subscription removes third-party advertisements, improving user experience.

cons.details: At EUR 61.90-67.90 per report, the flagship products represent significant investment compared to competitors offering cheaper alternatives.
While functional, the interface lacks the modern visual polish of newer astrology platforms, potentially deterring younger users.
Subscription options are limited to specific durations without monthly billing alternatives that many users prefer.
Physical horoscope delivery only available in EU, Switzerland, and Great Britain, excluding significant international audience.
Several product and information pages returned errors during analysis, suggesting navigation maintenance issues.

freeTier.limitations: Free daily horoscope covers current day only; advanced interpretations require purchase

pricing.valueAssessment: Astro.com's pricing reflects its premium positioning and renowned authorship. While EUR 61.90 for a single report exceeds many competitors, the depth and quality of Liz Greene's psychological interpretations justify the premium for serious astrology enthusiasts. The extensive free tier provides genuine value, allowing users to experience the platform's quality before purchasing. The Extended Daily Horoscope subscription at EUR 49.90/year (EUR 4.16/month) offers excellent value for daily users. Overall, the pricing is fair for the quality delivered, though budget-conscious users may find the entry barrier for premium reports significant.

history.story:
Astrodienst AG was established in Switzerland by Dr. Alois Treindl, who developed the revolutionary Swiss Ephemeris astronomical calculation engine in 1997. The Swiss Ephemeris, built upon NASA's JPL DE405/406 data, provided unprecedented accuracy in planetary position calculations and quickly became the industry standard for astrological software worldwide.

Under Dr. Treindl's leadership as CEO and webmaster, Astro.com evolved into "the first address for astrology on the web." The company's breakthrough came through partnerships with legendary astrologers, most notably Liz Greene, whose psychologically sophisticated interpretations set a new standard for computer-generated horoscopes. The proprietary Astro*Intelligence technology enables the software to synthesize chart factors the way professional astrologers do, recognizing inner patterns and personality structures.

Today, Astrodienst maintains its headquarters in Zollikon near Zürich, operating with a dedicated team including company manager and astrologer Juri Viktor Stork and editor Karin Hoffmann. The company continues to develop its ephemeris (updated to JPL DE431 in 2014) while expanding its content library with contributions from internationally respected authors including Robert Hand, Markus Jehle, and Bernadette Brady.

primaryUsers: Serious astrology enthusiasts seeking psychological depth
Professional astrologers needing accurate chart calculations
Individuals at life crossroads seeking self-understanding
targetAudience.idealFor: Astro.com serves anyone seeking sophisticated, psychologically-informed astrology beyond superficial sun-sign readings. The platform particularly excels for those interested in personal growth and self-understanding through the astrological lens. Professional astrologers benefit from the Swiss Ephemeris accuracy and extensive Astro-Databank research resources. The free tools provide excellent entry points for beginners, while the premium reports satisfy advanced practitioners. Parents interested in understanding their children's personalities and couples exploring relationship dynamics will find dedicated resources tailored to these needs.
targetAudience.notIdealFor: Those seeking quick, entertaining horoscopes may find Astro.com's depth and psychological focus overwhelming. Users expecting flashy, modern interfaces with gamification elements will be disappointed by the functional but dated design. Budget-constrained individuals may struggle with the premium report pricing. Those wanting live readings or direct astrologer consultations should look elsewhere, as Astro.com focuses on automated interpretations rather than personal consultation services.

navigation.notes: Comprehensive navigation structure with logical categorization. Mega menus provide quick access to all sections. Some deep pages showed 404 errors suggesting maintenance issues.

design.notes: Functional but dated visual design. Clean typography and readable layouts prioritize content over aesthetics. The interface shows its age compared to modern web standards but remains usable.

mobileExperience.notes: Responsive design adapts to mobile screens. A "Leave mobile view" option suggests attention to mobile users. Core functionality accessible on smaller devices.

accessibility.notes: Standard web accessibility features present. Alt text on images varies in quality. Complex chart visualizations may pose challenges for screen reader users.

pageSpeed.notes: Pages load reasonably but aren't optimized for modern performance standards. Some dynamic content and advertisements may impact loading times for non-subscribers.

depth.notes: The psychological depth of premium reports is exceptional. Free content provides substantial educational value. AstroWiki and documentation demonstrate commitment to thorough coverage.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Chart visualizations are clear and professionally rendered. Interactive chart generation tools work smoothly. Limited video content; focus is on text-based interpretation.

contactability.notes: Full contact information provided including Swiss phone number, physical address, and multiple email addresses. Phone support available weekdays 9 AM-12 PM and 2-4 PM Swiss time.

legitimacy.notes: Registered Swiss company (AG) with named executives. CEO Dr. Alois Treindl, manager Juri Viktor Stork, and editor Karin Hoffmann are identified. Contributing authors have verifiable credentials and public profiles.

legal.notes: Comprehensive privacy policy with GDPR compliance. Clear terms of use. Data stored on company servers in Switzerland. 10-year data retention per Swiss law with user deletion rights.

trustCredibility.summary: Astro.com demonstrates exceptional trustworthiness through its transparent Swiss corporate structure, 25+ year operating history, world-renowned author partnerships, and comprehensive legal compliance. The named leadership team, physical address, and multiple contact methods establish legitimacy. The only minor concern is some dated technical infrastructure resulting in occasional 404 errors.

faq.question: What is Astro.com and what does it offer?
faq.answer: Astro.com (Astrodienst) is a Swiss astrology platform offering free birth chart calculations, daily horoscopes, and premium psychological horoscope reports by renowned astrologers Liz Greene and Robert Hand. It provides the Swiss Ephemeris for precise calculations, AstroWiki encyclopedia, and Astro-Databank with 80,000+ celebrity charts.

faq.question: Is Astro.com free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, Astro.com offers substantial free features including birth chart generation, basic daily horoscopes, planetary position tracking, ephemeris data, AstroWiki, and Astro-Databank access. Premium reports by Liz Greene cost EUR 61.90-67.90 each, and extended subscriptions range from EUR 19.90-49.90.

faq.question: Is Astro.com legitimate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Astro.com is operated by Astrodienst AG, a registered Swiss company founded in 1997 by Dr. Alois Treindl. With over 25 years of operation, physical headquarters in Zürich, GDPR-compliant privacy policies, and partnerships with world-renowned astrologers, it is one of the most trustworthy astrology sites available.

faq.question: Who writes the horoscope reports on Astro.com?
faq.answer: The flagship reports are written by Dr. Liz Greene, a qualified Jungian analyst with doctorates in psychology and history, considered one of the most respected psychological astrologers worldwide. Robert Hand, a renowned astrological author since the 1970s, writes the daily horoscopes. Additional contributors include Markus Jehle, Bernadette Brady, and Johannes Schneider.

faq.question: How accurate is Astro.com for birth chart calculations?
faq.answer: Astro.com uses the Swiss Ephemeris, which reproduces NASA JPL data with 0.001 arcsecond precision. This makes it one of the most accurate calculation engines available, covering dates from 13201 BC to AD 17191. It is trusted by professional astrologers and software developers globally.

faq.question: What is the Psychological Horoscope Analysis by Liz Greene?
faq.answer: The Psychological Horoscope Analysis is an 18-25 page personalized report that combines astrology with Jungian depth psychology. It examines your basic psychological type, inner character patterns, childhood influences, relationship tendencies, and path toward personal integration. It costs EUR 61.90 for the digital version.

faq.question: Does Astro.com offer relationship compatibility reports?
faq.answer: Yes, the Relationship Horoscope by Liz Greene provides a 35-40 page analysis of partnership dynamics. It explores what brings partners together, the relationship as an entity, and deeper issues activated between partners. The base price is EUR 61.90, with an additional partner copy available for EUR 8.90.

faq.question: What languages does Astro.com support?
faq.answer: Astro.com is available in 12 languages: English, German, Danish, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Turkish, Russian, Chinese, and Japanese. Premium reports are professionally translated and available in most of these languages.

summary.recommendation:
Astro.com stands as the authoritative destination for serious astrology on the internet. For over 25 years, Astrodienst has maintained exceptional standards in both free resources and premium interpretations, earning its "World's Best Horoscopes" claim through partnerships with legends like Liz Greene and Robert Hand. The psychological depth of their reports transcends typical computerized horoscopes, offering genuine insights for personal growth.

The platform is ideal for anyone seeking substantial astrological content beyond entertainment-level horoscopes. Professional astrologers benefit from the Swiss Ephemeris accuracy and Astro-Databank research tools. Individuals at significant life transitions will find the Yearly Horoscope Analysis invaluable. Couples questioning relationship dynamics gain profound insights from the Relationship Horoscope. The extensive free tier makes it accessible for exploration before committing to premium purchases.

Budget-conscious users and those preferring modern, visually dynamic interfaces should consider alternatives. The premium reports represent significant investment at EUR 61.90 each, though the quality justifies the price for serious seekers. Those wanting live consultations or quick entertainment should look elsewhere, as Astro.com focuses on depth over immediacy.

With a rating of 8.5/10, Astro.com earns an "Excellent" verdict. The content quality and credibility are outstanding, held back only by dated design and premium pricing. For anyone serious about astrology as a tool for self-understanding, this remains the definitive online resource.
